channel.title: Mini-Game Contest ( Video )
channel.description:
I had some time off today from school, so I messed around with my server some. it is nothing too great, and my coding knolledge is limited to an extent, but I enjoy learning, and Yong min has been a great supporter in not just myself alot of other people in the community that I have noticed. So Special Thanks to him.
First Event, Made heal other to go with the weekly raids I made.
Features - admins heal max - prayer bonus + level increases your chance of hitting a crit heal which heals up to 88% - cannot be used in duels, wild, or to heal duelers - Heals up to 26% based on your prayer level - Requires 90 magic to use - can not heal if they are full health ~ I tested it around a bit today and didn't notice any bugs except sometimes if your directly 1 square diagnal from the player it will not heal. I'll look into perfecting it later and if anyone wants to go through the codes and help me fix it that works too.
second event~ Barrows or as I call I decided to call it Royal Chest.
- 3 undead royal family members. - Loot is based on random chance 1-150, if you roll 0 you get cracker, 1-3 you get drag weapons, 4-25 you get rune, 26-75 for certs and skill objects, 76-150 for runes\junk. each catagory has 20 options, which it'll then roll 1-20 to decide which loot you get out of that catagory.
~after testing it only a few things unfinished\unresolved. Some of which you see in the video. I made it so a player can only get the npc when searching the coffin if their rank is set at 0 for that npc ( so they cant spawn multiple ones ). I how ever need to make away so no one else can attack it, and so if they go upstairs it'll remove them. shouldn't be too difficult just havn't done it yet.
~I also need to finish registuring server to client to take off the client LIst of which you have killed. If you log it will but need to make a command yet so it'll register it off when you loot chest.
~ Going to disable paralyze monster in there so that it makes it a bit more challenging to solo, unless you have a partner for healing back & forth.
Other then that it works fine and its a good way for some one to make cash in your server. Hope you like, if not well i'm only in this for fun and to learn something new so deal with it lol.
Here is the vid. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYBO5ljIzrM
I'll upload codes + objects\landscape ect when I have some more time, gotta get back to some music and theory. No fun...

item.title: Mini-Game Contest ( Video )
item.dc:creator: @Rick_kloos Rick kloos
item.description:
@Rick_kloos wrote:

yes it does save their progression, and no its noobscape. I use what yong min releases because he has been guiding me through the learning process of coding. I am not the greatest but its coming along fairly well. Also, thanks for the compliments on the barrows. I’m gonna be up all night working on school work so I cannot upload the coding tonight, but when I have time i will. if you guys see any tips that could make it easier or to add to it that would be great. Also not that any rsc players will like this, but I made Rune enchanted armour, if you are wearing the 4 piece set your damage is increased. The armour and weapon is weak until under 50% health. At that point the damage is increased by 20% for every 10% decreasement in health: Ultimately allowing you to hit 66 if you are under 10 health & have 99 str and potted…

~ok sorry, thought you said rsce lol. Yeah yongs version of Easy rsc is what I use; I had a blond moment goin on, my bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Mini-Game Contest ( Video )
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Firstly this should be in the minigame contest thread. Other then that I like the barrows, what source did you use? ERSC? Id like to know if you saved the players progression if they log out do they lose it?

Read full topic

item.title: Mini-Game Contest ( Video )
item.dc:creator: @Rick_kloos Rick kloos
item.description:
@Rick_kloos wrote:

I had some time off today from school, so I messed around with my server some. it is nothing too great, and my coding knolledge is limited to an extent, but I enjoy learning, and Yong min has been a great supporter in not just myself alot of other people in the community that I have noticed. So Special Thanks to him.

First Event, Made heal other to go with the weekly raids I made.

Features

  • admins heal max
  • prayer bonus + level increases your chance of hitting a crit heal which heals up to 88%
  • cannot be used in duels, wild, or to heal duelers
  • Heals up to 26% based on your prayer level
  • Requires 90 magic to use
  • can not heal if they are full health
    ~ I tested it around a bit today and didn’t notice any bugs except sometimes if your directly 1 square diagnal from the player it will not heal. I’ll look into perfecting it later and if anyone wants to go through the codes and help me fix it that works too.

second event~ Barrows or as I call I decided to call it Royal Chest.

  • 3 undead royal family members.
  • Loot is based on random chance 1-150, if you roll 0 you get cracker, 1-3 you get drag weapons, 4-25 you get rune, 26-75 for certs and skill objects, 76-150 for runes\junk.
    each catagory has 20 options, which it’ll then roll 1-20 to decide which loot you get out of that catagory.

~after testing it only a few things unfinished\unresolved. Some of which you see in the video.
I made it so a player can only get the npc when searching the coffin if their rank is set at 0 for that npc ( so they cant spawn multiple ones ). I how ever need to make away so no one else can attack it, and so if they go upstairs it’ll remove them. shouldn’t be too difficult just havn’t done it yet.

~I also need to finish registuring server to client to take off the client LIst of which you have killed. If you log it will but need to make a command yet so it’ll register it off when you loot chest.

~ Going to disable paralyze monster in there so that it makes it a bit more challenging to solo, unless you have a partner for healing back & forth.

Other then that it works fine and its a good way for some one to make cash in your server. Hope you like, if not well i’m only in this for fun and to learn something new so deal with it lol.

Here is the vid.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYBO5ljIzrM

I’ll upload codes + objects\landscape ect when I have some more time, gotta get back to some music and theory. No fun…
